content.p: Explore the mystery of the lacquer tree and the millennia-old legacy of lacquer art with NCI and create your own artwork Join us for an enlightening session on Chinese lacquer art with a history of over 7,000 years, followed by a hands-on workshop. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of lacquer art and create your own water-lacquer fan to take home! Refreshments will be provided. Admission free and all welcome. This event is organised by NCI in partnership with CSSA. We look forward to seeing you there! Room A23, CI Library Si Yuan Building Jubilee Campus Nottingham, NG8 1BB telephone: +44 (0)115 748 4502 fax: +44 (0)115 846 6324 email: confucius.institute@nottingham.ac.uk
